name: Bullet list
author: Total Avengers
css:
.wul ul { padding: 0 0 0 17px; margin: 0; }
	.wul ul div { padding-left: 10px; }

name: Callout
author: Total Avengers

name: Code
author: Total Avengers
css:
.wcode pre { display: block; margin: 0; padding: 0; }
	.wcode pre code { display: block; padding: 15px; background-color: #F0F0F0; border-radius: 8px; }

name: Counter
author: Total Avengers
html: 0h

name: Credentials
author: Total Avengers

name: Empty line
author: Total Avengers

name: H1
author: Total Avengers
css: .wh1 h1 { padding: 0 0 8px; margin: 0; font-size: 34px; font-weight: bold; border-bottom: 2px solid #D0D0D0; }

name: H2
author: Total Avengers
css: .wh2 h2 { padding: 0; margin: 0; font-size: 26px; font-weight: bold; }

name: H3
author: Total Avengers
css: .wh3 h3 { padding: 0; margin: 0; font-size: 20px; font-weight: bold; }

name: Horizontal line
author: Total Avengers

name: Notes
author: Total Avengers

name: Numbered list
author: Total Avengers
css:
.wol ol { padding: 0 0 0 17px; margin: 0; }
	.wol ol div { padding-left: 10px; }
